A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Finn got next to no screentime and close to no actual heroic moments- a major letdown. Poe\, Rey\, and Luke \"I know there is good in you\" Skywalker are drastically and offensively mischaracterized. The central conflict could have been avoided with a few words of communication\, but it ended up nearly destroying the resistance and made Finn\, Rose\, and Poe look like idiots. Spent half the movie focusing on Kylo and couldn't even make him interesting. I honestly think Attack of the Clones was a better movie.
